issue.title: Add TB3-PO App from Logarhythm1

labels.name: wontfix
labels.description: This will not be worked on

issue.body:
This fork has a very nice sequencer: https://github.com/Logarhythm1/O_C-HemisphereSuite/blob/logarhythm-branch/software/o_c_REV/HEM_TB3PO.ino

I feel capable to do this from a coding standpoint but I'm having trouble to get the old Arduino/Teensy toolchain to work on my macbook...

comment.body:
fwiw, if somebody else finds this, I removed captain midi and pong over [here](https://github.com/cryptix/O_C-HemisphereSuite/tree/tb3po) which made enough space for it.

(the supplied image from logarithm doesn't work correctly with the VOR adjustments)

payload.description: Hemisphere Suite is alternate alternate firmware for Ornament and Crime, featuring a dual-applet framework with dozens of different modular functions.

forkee.name: O_C-HemisphereSuite
forkee.description: Hemisphere Suite is alternate alternate firmware for Ornament and Crime, featuring a dual-applet framework with dozens of different modular functions.

issue.title: Add TB3-PO App from Logarhythm1
issue.body:
This fork has a very nice sequencer: https://github.com/Logarhythm1/O_C-HemisphereSuite/blob/logarhythm-branch/software/o_c_REV/HEM_TB3PO.ino

I feel capable to do this from a coding standpoint but I'm having trouble to get the old Arduino/Teensy toolchain to work on my macbook...

issue.title: Retrieving "votes" replies for a message ref?
issue.body:
From matrix chats:

> maybe we could extend subset to then accept a '{"op":"and","args":[{"op":"message","ref":"..."},{"op":"type","string":"vote"}]}' where message / ref doesn't exist yet but that'd be possible to gather votes on the posts? or maybe there is a better way of grabbing votes from a ref? how does JS world do it? hopefully the thinking matches the code / is possible 🤣

This would be the final step for having all the pieces to build threads. The `tangles.thread` call covers the rest.

It could already be possible and I haven't realised! Or perhaps this `getSubset` approach is not the best. It might be nice to have this come out with the `tangles.thread` response also? So then it is just one call? Idk if the index for that is there tho. I'm a bit lost on how to start thinking about an approach for it. Still don't quite understand the logic of the indices.

Any thoughts @boreq @cryptix?

comment.body:
The matrix quote is a bit specific , in that it asks for votes on a single message.

It might be easier to get all messages for the whole thread and group the results of the query into posts and votes afterwards.

pull_request.title: Add currency to prices and (sub)totals
pull_request.body:
right now, hardcoded to Euro as a demo and to scratch my own itch.

If wanted I can clean this up to make it configurable.

Just not sure where, I don't write a lot of python so pointers welcome.. :)
